TokenTimelock.constructor (/unique_chucks/42/0xad7cd1241591ccb6a7a310fffeedba3a708f62f0.sol#641-654) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_releaseTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/42/0xad7cd1241591ccb6a7a310fffeedba3a708f62f0.sol#650-651)

TokenTimelock.release (/unique_chucks/42/0xad7cd1241591ccb6a7a310fffeedba3a708f62f0.sol#657-668) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= releaseTime) (/unique_chucks/42/0xad7cd1241591ccb6a7a310fffeedba3a708f62f0.sol#661-664)
